name: Declutter Series - Gmail
description: Removes adverts and useless buttons. Faithful in style to unmodified Gmail, compatible with most other themes, including all Google-provided themes. Part of the Declutter Series.

user.name: Herossaumure
user.about: I am gradually learning HTML5 and CSS by making styles and websites. Visit my testing page: Testing Site for HTML (tumblr) Contact me: Herossaumure (tumblr) Herossaumure (reddit)

additional_info:
Suitable for those using Gmail for email only. Items removed:
  • Adverts
  • Google+ features (re-removed after update)
  • Links to other Google apps
  • Auto-categories
